Lançado em 2009, o Scup foi criado com u: Released in 2009, Scup was created with a big goal: to help companies and agencies to work effectively with social media. The tool allows people to actually know everything that is discussed online about their brands and companies, and to help identify the impact of these conversations. Furthermore,  it monitors  interactions  on social networks, manage this information and generate analysis. Scup operates in four areas: Monitoring, Social Customer Service, Social CRM and profiles management. Currently, Scup serves more than 500 clients of different sizes and in various business sectors.

Lançado em 2009, o Scup foi criado com u: Released in 2009, Scup was created with a big goal: to help companies and agencies to work effectively with social media. Lançado em 2009, o Scup foi criado com u: Released in 2009, Scup was created with a big goal: to help companies and agencies to work effectively with social media. The tool allows users to actually know everything that is discussed online about brands and companies, and to help identify the impact of these conversations. Further,  it monitors  interactions  on social networks, manage this information and generate analysis. Scup operates in four areas: Monitoring, Social Customer Service, Social CRM and profiles management. Currently, Scup serves more than 500 clients of different sizes and in various business sectors. Since 2012, it also offers content on a social networking portal that is a benchmark in the market, %sScup Ideas%s.
A ferramenta de trabalho líder para moni: The leading tool for monitoring, profile management and customer service on social networks.
Classificação de posts por tipo e sentim: Classifying posts by type and feeling
Criação e distribuição de tickets por co: Creation and distribution of tickets per employee
Relatórios sobre a qualidade das interaç: Reports on the quality of interactions
Análise de performance de perfis e publi: Performance analysis of profiles and posts
Diferentemente do senso comum, não exist: Unlike everything else, we do not exist just to make profit. We believe that a company can and must have a cause. We want to boost the transformation brought about by social networks. We also believe that these communication channels make the relationships between businesses and consumers and between government and people more transparent, fair and equal.
Existem empresas que levam esse propósit: There are companies that take their purpose seriously (not many, unfortunately), and try to overcome the traditional organizational model. One example is Zappos.com footwear e-commerce, known worldwide for the quality of its customer service. Zappos’ mission is not to sell shoes but to "deliver happiness”. This model is a great inspiration to us and our way of conducting business.
O Scup faz responsabilidade social para: Scup is socially responsible just to "compensate" for the predatory corporate world? No, Scup understands that having a positive impact on society and treating our employees well are not forms of compensation, simply one of the main reasons that the company exists. We believe that in today’s business world, companies have a responsibility to “sell" values and beliefs.
Buscamos impulsionar as transformações t: We seek to boost the transformations brought about by social networks through the balance of three pillars: customers, results, and people.
Clientes: queremos gerar impactos para: Customers: we want to generate an impact so customers are able to improve social networks usage. Customer satisfaction is not an end goal, but only a sign that this is being perceived.
Resultados: buscamos otimizar o trabalho: Results: we seek to optimize the work that is being done and its financial sustainability.
Pessoas: valorizamos a autonomia. Ao mes: People: We value autonomy. While it brings flexibility, it also demands more responsibility with deliveries and with clients.
We seek to exercise a horizontal management. We believe in the autonomy to serve our customers and optimize results. We understand that it is easier to create an organization based on policies, control and hierarchy. However, a company based on team learning and dialogue has increased meaning and sustainability.
O Scuper é um profissional ousado, inqui: Scupers are bold, restless and multidisciplinary professionals. In our recruitment process, we value people with entrepreneurial attitude, sense of urgency and practical knowledge instead of diplomas and degrees.
No Scup, respeitamos e estimulamos a div: In Scup, we respect and encourage the diversity and individuality of employees. Our environment is open to everyone to be authentic and share ideas and opinions freely.
A ferramenta líder para trabalhar nas re: The leading tool to work with social networks .

Enfrente os desafios do mundo das redes: Meet the challenges of the world of social networking with Scup
Nas redes sociais, existem opiniões, men: There are opinions, messages and conversations about your business in social networks that need to be heard, analyzed and answered.
Nós aqui do Scup sabemos como esse mundo: Here at Scup, we know how hard the business world can be. Therefore, we have developed a tool that collects the conversations taking place on social networks, in real time, stores the information and allows analysis of it using  simple and intuitive interface.
O Scup deixa seu dia a dia mais eficient: Scup makes your day to day operations more efficient. You can personalize and automate several actions of the monitoring work on social networks. In this fashion you can make better use of your time!
O Scup apresenta informações estratégica: Scup offers strategic information to measure the results of your initiatives in social networks which helps you to make conscious decisions.
Monitore o que falam da sua marca no Fac: Monitor what is being said about your brand on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ and other 13 social networks in real-time. Within a few seconds of initiating a desired monitoring protocol it will be possible to start identifying  any issues involving your company.
Compare a saúde da sua marca com a dos s: Compare the health of your brand with its competitors, knowing the frequency of citations and criticism/compliments paid to it in relation to the rest of the market.
Acesse os melhores dados para descobrir: Access the best data to find out the needs of people. When you know what your audience wants it is much easier to create campaigns, conduct sales, enhance your product or service, produce research and explore new business opportunities.
Saiba quem são os influenciadores da sua: Learn who the influencers of your brand are: the people who talk about your company, the content they share, their number of followers and where they are located. Among other advantages, knowing your influencers allows you to avoid crises.
Descubra em qual mídia social mais se fa: Find out in which social media your brand is more talked of. In this way you can decide where to focus your marketing efforts and digital communication.
Tenha uma visão clara e objetiva do seu: Have a clear and objective view of your monitoring through detailed graphics automatically generated by the tool.
SAC 2.0 e CRM Social integrados: Integrated Social Customer Service and Social CRM
O Scup entrega os melhores dados para vo: Scup delivers the best data for you to interact with consumers, enhance your image and find new business opportunities.
Responda a dúvidas e reclamações dos seu: Respond to questions and complaints from your customers in real time. You can answer them without leaving the platform, in a central and secure manner.
Mensure a qualidade do atendimento da su: Measure the quality of your Customer Service staff on social networks. Our robust interaction reports show the number of calls made on the social networks in a given period, the average response time to inquiries and complaints from customers and the amount of mentions classified.
Saiba quem são os detratores da sua marc: Learn who the detractors of your brand are, identify critical situations and manage crisis. Know also who advocates your brand and interact with them to assure their loyalty and to strengthen the relationship with your base.
Integre informações das redes sociais co: Integrate information from social networks with email bases.
Agrupe as dúvidas e reclamações por tipo: Group questions and complaints by type of request and sentiment (positive, negative, neutral or mixed). Discover which products, services and processes in your company can evolve.
Automatize a classificação das menções à: Automate the classification of the entries to your brand. Scup has a feature that allows you to automate as much as 80% of the classification process of posts about your company. Then just view the Scup reports - or export the raw data - and draw your conclusions.
Saiba qual é o alcance das suas mensagen: Learn what the extent of your posts on social networks is with ready reports which show the potential of people impacted by what’s being said about your company.
O Scup permite o gerenciamento de difere: Scup allows the safe management of different profiles and brings insights into your publications.
Publique e agende fotos e vídeos em vári: You can schedule and post photos and videos on various social networks. Scup allows the classification of its publications (by type or year) and reveals which were the most liked, shared and commented.
Agende fotos e textos e receba recomenda: Schedule photos and text and get recommendations on the amount of times you should post throughout the day, the best times to launch your content and formats that are most successful.
Compare suas páginas e perfis com as dos: Compare your pages and profiles with those of your competitors.
Saiba quantas visitas e clientes as suas: Learn how many visits and customers your publications have generated. An integration between Google Analytics and Scup shows the data you need to best invest.
Descubra o alcance das suas mensagens e: Discover the reach of your posts and the most discussed topics.
Saiba os melhores horários e formatos pa: Learn the best times and formats to share your content through automated analysis tool.
Faça campanhas segmentadas, direcionando: Produce targeted campaigns, with seven posting options: gender, relationship status, education level, interests, age, location and language.
A página que você procurava não existe,: The page you were looking for does not exist, you may have entered an incorrect address, or the content was removed.
Uma equipe jovem, residente em São Paulo: A young team residing in São Paulo, and eager for relevant results on social networks and technology.
Nosso time é formado por pessoas jovens: Our team consists of young and multidisciplinary people. Marketing, Journalism, Computer Science, Public Relations, Administration professionals who possess the desire to create solutions that can help you with your day-to-day social media work.
O Gu é quem pensa no Scup como um negóci: Gu is the one who thinks Scup as business. He loves technology, dogs, music, entrepreneurship and nature. He also enjoys triathlon, and his great qualities are patience and determination, in addition to charisma.
A Alê é a responsável por manter toda eq: Ale is responsible for maintaining all commercial team on track. Born in Belo Horizonte, brought up in Curitiba, in love with London and now working in São Paulo, she brought all this multi-cultural knowledge to Scup. She is thorough, observant and famous for having the memory of two elephants. Can you do ten things at once (while solving other ten)? Ex-gymnast, ex-parachutist, a former competitive swimmer and practitioner of other extreme sports , today she gets too tired just by taking pictures of her husband’s street races.
Extremamente comunicativa, é um dos pila: Extremely communicative, she is a mainstay of the team for new business. She came to Scup to help acquire new customers. She uses the power of speech to explain Scup’s functioning bit by bit. Curious, she loves to know how her coworkers face the struggles of life while deciding if she gets married, buys a bike or does an inventory of the Herbalife shakes she keeps at home. Regular customer of Tok & Stok, she’s back from lunch every day with something new for her house, like a towel, a plate or a simple Tupperware.
Responsável por ir atrás dos clientes on: Responsible for going after the customers wherever they are, he is another member of the Field Sales team. He has the habit of confusing his own car and trying to open the door of the neighboring vehicle. He’s a Muay Thai fighter and MMA regular, sometimes comes to Scup with makeup to hide his black eyes. He’s also a dedicated father and never misses a chance to make fun of someone.
Reforço do Scup para a área de Field Sal: Another member of Scup’s Field Sales team. Intelligent and knowledgeable, he’s a walking Wikipedia. He always has an answer on the tip of his tongue and begins his explanations with a “It’s funny ... “. Believes that beauty is essential and is a “MacGyver meets Chuck Norris” kind of guy. He knows better than anyone how to use charisma and wisdom to keep Scup customers happy and calm. He’s able to devour a box of tic tac in 12 seconds. He already worked as a police officer, an architect, a lawyer, a racer, a wrestler and a dancer.
O Didi é a mente por trás da metodologia: Didi is the mind behind Scup’s methodology. He has three defining characteristics: the “Joe Ramone" way of walking, and the tone of voice of a Zen Buddhist. He’s also a pub philosopher and he teaches his philosophy to all scuppers. But it is not just that! He also dances samba rock and gafieira, and is kind of loony.
A equipe de Marketing nunca mais foi a m: The marketing team was never the same after this Dennis the Menace double arrived: everyone looks at him with the thought of "I know you from somewhere ...”. He came to help with digital actions and the management of Scup’s leads. Originally from São Paulo’s country side, he studies Advertising and keeps his angelical side even being a fan of psychopaths TV shows. He uses Facebook in French, further enhancing the aura of intellectuality that surrounds him.
O Eliseu é responsável pela área de Comu: Eliseu is in charge of Scup’s Communication and Content. As a journalist he participated in the coverage of historical events such as the Arab Spring, and interviewed controversial personalities like Pastor Silas Malafaia. He’s tireless and loves working with multiple projects simultaneously. In his spare time he enjoys watching series on American politics - and can spend hours talking about the President Jed Bartlet’s challenges (The West Wing). He’s methodical and has been compared to the character Sheldon Cooper (The Big Bang Theory) by his mother. Thinks that a little madness has never hurt anybody.
Era uma vez uma criança que adorava escr: Once there was a child who loved to write stories. One day she grew up and joined Scup’s Communication and Content team. Claudia was born in São Paulo and is always with a song in her head. She lived in France for a while, but didn’t learn how to cook. She’s a huge fan of Calvin & Hobbes , old movies and Nutella .
O Lucas é o personal Austin Powers da ár: Lucas is the Austin Powers of the Content team. He combines his "mojo" with naughty slang that sometimes didn’t seem to become him, you know, bro? Despite all listlessness and trickery, he is a romantic and sweet guy that takes his girlfriend to Disneyworld. He did a Backstreet Boys cover once and played for Real Madrid in PES 2010.
Chegou no Scup para somar toda sua belez: She arrived at Scup to add her beauty and wit to the beauty and wit already present in the content team. She keeps her hair fluttering like a L’Oreal add and takes good care of the technical contents of Scup. Not a day goes by without her following the blog “Morri de Sunga Branca “. About to graduate in Public Relations, Thay has a refined taste in music that goes from John Mayer  to Lelek Lek .
Ruivos dão azar? Não este! O Gabriel org: Redheads are bad luck? Not this one! Gabriel organizes all Scup’s internal processes. He's super fast and wants everything ready quickly. Despite looking like Syndrome from the movie The Incredibles, he has a soft heart and is always helping everyone. He also loves to play tennis and play with Cookie, his Border Collie. He is extremely organized and focused when performing any task. His motto is AUTOMATE.
Chegou ao financeiro do Scup toda tímida: She was really shy when she arrived at Scup, but is always making jokes now. Tefinha helps Scup’s customers and employees with all financial requests. She trained her expressiveness in acting classes, but now prefers to take out her anger at the gym. She has promised to start bodybuilding next year. She loves her dog, Romeo. She’s crazy about coffee, and knows Excel formulas by heart. She always says “bye bye" on the phone with a loud and funny voice.
Nosso amigo pseudo-italiano é quem gera: Our pseudo Italian friend is the one who generates and analyzes the numbers and creates processes for all areas of Scup. Although he tries, he can’t hide his frustration with being the Godfather. Stubborn since childhood, he collects watches, smokes cigars and does not leave home before making sure the shirt matches the shoe laces.
Luis enjoys quite a variety of sports. He’s crazy about football (roots for the Colts), likes watching MMA fights and Formula 1, Indy and Nascar races. In his free time, he roots for Palmeiras - nobody is perfect. Like any geek, he loves Star Wars, plays video games (he’s glued to his PS3) and collects DVDs and Blu-Rays . When it comes to music, Luis is also eclectic: he listens to all styles of rock, mostly Angra, Iron Maiden and Noel Gallagher (Oasis). He lives in Santos and travels every day to work in Scup’s technology team.
Chegou para ser Desenvolvedor Front End: Wesley came to be a Front End Developer and in a few days he showed us new technologies that could be used but weren’t. He’s very enterprising and intelligent, and has been developing applications that make life easier for Internet users. He has many friends and an enemy. He’s a great Silvio Santos impersonator, and like many others, is a fan of Apple. For him things are never good enough, never right enough, never well made . Not even Apple products.
Seu computador está lento? A internet nã: Is your computer slow? The internet does not help? The printer is broken? The phone is wheezing? Ewerton is your savior. He keeps a collection of 365 plaid shirts to be used over the year. He’s a hardworking guy who brought all the gallantry learned in Itapevi into Scup. He goes by many names like Jeff, Ewer, Jefferson, Reverson, Emerson, Washington, Uérrli, among others.
A Lu trabalha na área financeira do Scup: Lu works with billing and purchasing. She worked with her mother in their flower shop. No wonder she loves flowers, plants and everything green (mainly Palmeiras). She is married to an aspiring football player and has a dog named Babs. Her dream is to see Venice. She’s quiet, very observant, and thorough with the tasks she undertakes.
O Deco veio para o Scup para auxiliar vo: Deco came to Scup to help platform users. He is the one who takes care of our service and support. He roots for Corinthians, is really patriotic, loves his Dalmatian Gandja and his cat Dilma. He listens to jazz, hip hop, funk, dub and afrobeat. Despite the desire to be born in the 60s and have Yoda or Al Pacino in the family, he can’t live without internet. He’s the only one at Scup who can knit, besides being a gardener, a woodworker and furniture designer in his spare time.
Para reforçar o time de Suporte e Atendi: Talita came to Scup to strengthen the Customer Support team. Entertaining and enterprising, directs the company's own flavors and bold like haircuts. She has the superpower of learning things in the blink of an eye and quickly solves problems. She’s an amateur photographer and loves owls. She sleeps very little, because she needs to leave her place before daybreak to get to work.
Chegou no Scup para amparar a equipe com: He arrived at Scup to support the sales team and new customers. He’s tattooed and sings in a Foo Fighters cover band. He roots for São Paulo and looks like a character from a teens’ soap opera. He’s a great swimmer a safe haven for customers who need help with using the tool. Introspective and quiet, we can never know if he is happy or sad. He uses plaid shirts a lot.
A mascotinha do Scup veio para encher a: She’s Scup’s mascot who came to fill the company with "audible noises" and her ultrasonic sneeze. She works with relationship and customer service, taking care of the commercial management of the accounts. She loves going to the gym and riding her bike when the moon isn’t crescent, waning, full or new. She’s dedicated, nonsensical and extremely sincere. Not everyone likes what she says.
A Ju é a responsável pelo conteúdo de me: Ju is responsible for the content of best practices of the platform, network relationship, events organization and customer relationship. She loves reading books, watching movies and traveling. She hates people who can eat snacks every day, and is an eternal Harry Potter orphan. Her laughter echoes through the halls of Scup.
Have you ever heard of Brumado? Neither have we. But this was where Natan came from. He’s now our mascot. He can be seen playing drums (with imaginary drumsticks) every day. In fact, he is unleashing his rock star career, and in his spare time, he works at Scup’s educational area to help you improve your skills with our tool.
O Shira é quem está constantemente pensa: Shira is one who is constantly thinking about making Scup increasingly indispensable to users. His major objective is to have fun. He loves riding a kart, playing poker, watching American sitcoms and listening to music. He’s addicted to Mario on Wii, and always promises to "start playing seriously" when he loses. He’s troll hunter in WoW .
O Ciro cuida “da cara” do Scup, fazendo: Ciro takes care of the interface design. He’s always concerned with the user experience while using the platform. He’s interested in computer games and is especially fond of drawing cartoons and comics. He’s always saying his catch phrase:  “Just die!". He’s an undead priest in WoW .
O Thies é o cara que está por trás de mu: Thies is the guy who behind many of the features that users can view on Scup. He loves games, American sitcoms and movies. He’s almost always quiet and when he opens his mouth is to troll someone . He is a troll shaman in WoW .
O Kenji auxilia no desenvolvimento das f: Kenji assists in the development of Scup features. He never gives up a barbecue; he loves American TV shows, and plays magic with coins in his spare time. In music, he likes Butterbur, Luan & Vanessa, É o Tchan and Fafá de Belém. He is a goblin shaman in WoW.
O Luiz, também conhecido como Flinks, é: Luiz, also known as Flinks, is the one who guarantees that Scup is always up and running. He practices yoga and enjoys skydiving. He’s almost a professional poker player, learned Monopoly in less than two weeks and won a tournament. He’s top 5 in StarCraft 2 gold league.
O “Kenny G” do Scup é quem ajuda a criar: The Scup’s "Kenny G" who helps to create new solutions to enhance the social networking market. He loves sports like volleyball, running, swimming, riding a wave board and a freeboard and enjoys fiction and thrillers, plus general games . He’s an aspiring nerd and a tauren paladin in WoW .
O Sidão é quem cuida dos sistemas intern: Sidão is who takes care of the internal systems of Scup . He enjoys traveling and is a master online poker player. He never misses a party, even when they happen at the same time, impossible as it may seem. He always asks the same question in any matter "Does that make sense?".
Reservado e quieto, veio para o Scup par: Quiet and reserved, he came to Scup to implement automated tests to identify possible failures of the platform and to manage the quality of the work process with the technology team. He likes to stay home, and isn’t too fond of parties. He’s crazy about his wife and daughter. He’s a fan of first person shooter games, despite the controversy, and brought back matches of Counter Strike at lunchtime.

O Scup reúne num só lugar as funcionalid: Scup gathers functionality in one place for you to monitor social networks, serve your customers, manage profiles and generate reports.
Lançado em 2009, o Scup foi criado com u: Released in 2009, Scup was created with a big goal: helping companies and agencies to work effectively with social media. The tool allows users to actually know everything that is talked online about brands and companies, identify the impact of conversations, interact on social networks, manage information and generate analysis. Scup operates in four areas: Monitoring, SAC 2.0, Social CRM and profiles’ management. Currently, Scup serves more than 500 clients of different sizes and sectors. Since 2012, it also offers content on a social networking portal that is a benchmark in the market, %sScup Ideas%s.
Acreditamos em uma gestão horizontal e n: We believe in a horizontal management and in autonomy to serve our customers and optimize results. We understand that it is easier to create a company guided by policies, control and organization hierarchy, but a company based on team learning and the quality of dialogue has increased and sustainable meaning.
O Scuper é um profissional ousado, inqui: The Scuper is a bold, restless and multidisciplinary professional. In our recruitment process, we value people with entrepreneurial attitude, sense of urgency and practical knowledge.

Cuida dos clientes que entram em contato: She takes care of the customers who requests things from Scup. She’s clever, thinks quickly and is always paying attention to the processes to recommend some improvement when necessary. She’s friendly, crazy about photography, and is addicted to all foods containing sugar. She enjoys playing guitar and sports. She sucks at both, though. She’s really fond of nail polish, makeup and infamous jokes.
Reforço para nossa equipe comercial, o c: Allan came here to try to increase the number of Scup users. He's a great observer and is always gathering information to use in commercial meetings chit-chat. He likes electronics, dogs and is extremely attached to his family. Never misses a barbecue with friends nor new clients.
Responsável por atender com simpatia os: He is in charge of meeting our clients in a really friendly way. He's also friendly when he calls a radio station to ask for a funk song. He hardly ever loses his focus, even when we try to distract him. Currently divides his time between caring for his dog named Jack Daniel’s and scheduling the next visit to a Japanese restaurant, his declared addiction. He's patient and helpful, and wishes we had a more slippery floor in Scup so he could moonwalk perfectly.
Responsável pela gestão dos canais digit: Carla is responsible for managing digital channels and by generating and converting leads. She lives in Barueri and has a degree in Advertising and Marketing. Her biggest dream is to be part of a  tap dancing musical, but her talent is limited to Christmas presentations. She's a natural born planner and doesn't like being a housewife. She loves to travel and to be with her three nephews. She has a memory like an elephant and a very sarcastic sense of humor.
Chegou no Scup para trabalhar na área de: He arrived at Scup to work in the area of communication. He is apparently shy, but feels really at ease in small groups. Paulo has a degree in Public Relations, lived in Finland for some time, but can't speak the language. He is responsible for creating client cases so that everyone can examine the different uses of Scup. With a sarcastic sense of humor, he likes to discuss TV shows, and has a good ear for accents.
Caçula de uma família de 3 irmãos e o ún: He is the youngest of a family of 3 brothers and the only one who didn't have a degree in Physical Education. Willian is in Scup to program what you, the user of the platform, see when using Scup. He was born Extrema (MG), and is really shy. He's also extremely concentrated when performing his functions, and considers himself boring and lazy. Willian watches soccer only during the World Cup and, despite living alone, goes to his grandmother’s every day for lunch. he's the only Scuper who doesn't get bored when playing LOL.
O Deco veio para o Scup para auxiliar vo: Deco came to Scup to help platform users. He is the one who takes care of our service and support. He roots for Corinthians, is really patriotic, loves his Dalmatian Gandja and its puppy Belô. He listens to jazz, hip hop, funk, dub and afrobeat. Despite the desire to be born in the 60s and have Yoda or Al Pacino in the family, he can’t live without internet. He’s the only one at Scup who can knit, besides being a gardener, a woodworker and furniture designer in his spare time.
A Thalita é a responsável por enxergar o: Thalita is responsible for seeing opportunities that may go unnoticed by those who use Scup. She’s always in touch with our clients. She is newly married and is frequently asking for recipes to test her (few) culinary skills. She is super organized, serious and focused, and hasn’t discovered her favorite hobby yet. She has an acid humor, likes to travel and always has a quick answer on the tip of the tongue. Can do a thousand things at once and deliver it on time. Her memory can‘t be considered a strength.
Aninha é quem recebe, avalia e eventualm: Aninha é quem recebe, avalia e eventualmente entra em contato com os novos talentos que querem trabalhar no Scup. Hoje é responsável pelo RH, mas já almejou ser bailarina, professora, pedreira e açougueira. Conseguiu um pouco de sucesso na profissão de "Arrancadora de Matos de Paralepípedos". Entende como niguém as necessidades e anseios das pessoas e usa este poder para construir um time de colaboradores imbatível. Psicóloga de formação, mora em Jundiaí por opção e acorda de péssimo humor. Por já ter sido Au Pair na Califórnia, manja de bebês, fraldas, parquinhos e de conhecer gente diferente.
O Giba está no Scup para ser aquela pont: Giba is the bridge between technology, business and customers. He is responsible for Scup’s strategy development, and helps to organize and design new product features. He was a digital product designer once, founder and manager of startups, and advertising agencies manager, he collects action figures, has two cats, and more than 70 articles published in Webinsider. He’s also a fanatic gamer, and practices meditation every morning to learn how to remain calm during a crisis.
Chegou para integrar nossa equipe de tec: Matheus works with technology infrastructure at Scup. He was born in Pindamonhagaba and is a huge fan of car racing. He’s really focused on his goals, and uses his shyness as an excuse to concentrate in his work. He enjoys reading, cycling and listening to heavy metal to relax. He’s always sketching, and promises to go back to his drawings one day. He’s a Master in Mario Kart.
Se existe algum evento no qual o Scup po: She organizes Scup’s events.  She likes horror movies and cooking, not necessarily in the same video. She hates pastries made with lemon or passion fruit, but loves inventing recipes. She’s quiet, gentle, tireless and always has a smile on her face. She’s really afraid of spiders and moths. Doesn’t like tea.

Ruivos dão azar? Não este! O Gabriel org: Ruivos dão azar? Não este! O Gabriel organiza todos os processos internos do Scup. É super acelerado e quer tudo para ontem, principalmente quando precisa de algo do Sidão. Apesar da pinta de vilão d'%sOs Incríveis%s, tem um baita coração mole e é super atencioso com todos. Adora jogar tênis e brincar com o Cookie, seu Border Collie. É extremamente organizado e concentrado quando está realizando qualquer tarefa. Sua palavra de ordem é AUTOMATIZAR.
Aninha é quem recebe, avalia e eventualm: Aninha is the one who receives, evaluates and eventually contacts new talents interested in working at Scup. Today she's responsible for HR, but has in the past dreamed of being a ballerina, a teacher, a bricklayer and a butcher. Aninha did have some success in the "Cobblestone Weed Puller" profession. She understands people's needs and aspirations better than anyone and uses this power to build an unbeatable team. A trained psychologist, she lives in Jundiaí by choice and wakes up in a foul mood. Having been an Au Pair in California, Aninha likes babies, diapers, playgrounds and meeting different people.
Chegou para integrar nossa equipe de tec: He arrived to join our technology team and help with the Scup infrastructure. From Pindamonhangaba, he's a die-hard motorsport fan and follows each and every championship there is. Focused on his goals, he takes advantage of his shyness to close in completely on the work he needs to do. He enjoys reading, cycling and listening to heavy rock music to relax. He's reserved and always sketching, promising to return one day to his drawing hobby. He's also an eighth dan master in Mario Kart.

O Plano Acadêmico é destinado a professo: O Plano Acadêmico é destinado a professores, orientadores e estudantes de Graduação, Pós-Graduação e Cursos com foco em Marketing, Social Media, Comunicação, Publicidade e Estratégia.
O plano surge com o objetivo de estimula: O plano surge com o objetivo de estimular o mercado em fase de ingresso no segmento de mídias sociais a conhecer o Scup como opção de ferramenta de monitoramento para suas pesquisas e análises de marcas e produtos nas redes sociais.
* Caso tenha necessidades específicas, e: * Caso tenha necessidades específicas, entre em contato conosco.
Para utilizar os benefícios do Plano Aca: Para utilizar os benefícios do Plano Acadêmico, o usuário deve cadastrar um e-mail válido da instituição de ensino (ex.: joao.silva@pucsp.br), preencher o formulário de cadastro e aceitar os termos de uso. O Plano Acadêmico é gratuito, válido por 2 ou 6 meses, e renovável se necessário. No caso de renovação, todos os itens coletados são apagados.
Não será permitido o uso deste plano par: Não será permitido o uso deste plano para fins comerciais, ou pesquisas ligadas a empresas que não façam parte de algum trabalho acadêmico, como TCC, Monografia, etc.
Caso tenha alguma dúvida, visite nosso %: Caso tenha alguma dúvida, visite nosso %sFAQ sobre o Plano Acadêmico%s.

A Katherine é disciplinada, organizada,: Katherine is disciplined, organized, determined and, most importantly, healthy. A psychologist by training, but a nutritionist and personal trainer by nature, she adopts a light approach to life, without neglecting responsibilities. Even in the prime of her life, she doesn't stop training to become a marathon runner.
O nome dele é Lucas Vilas Boas, mas aqui: His name is Lucas Vilas Boas, but here in Scup he's been given the nickname VB. A graphic designer, VB is passionate about creating interfaces, an activity which he has developed since 2006. He understands that a good interface can dramatically change the way people interact with a product. VB's role in Scup is to create unique experiences for users of the tool. In his free time he enjoys skateboarding, carpentry and watching TV shows.
O Russo é um cara muito doido. Anda de u: Russo is an unconventional kind of guy. He walks from one side of room to the other thinking about his secret tricks to make Scup a better product. Trained in graphic design, and subsequently in engineering, Russo brings his analytical and visual talents together to direct our product decisions. But make no mistake: he really is off the wall! Perhaps because of the indigestible mixture of electronic music, heavy metal and living with Diego. Or maybe he was just born like that, but his mother didn't want to talk about it.
O Limão veio direto de Campinas para a e: Limão came straight from Campinas to the Scup product team. The dude is super organized and responsible, but everyone knows that he undergoes a transformation outside Scup. A lover of electronic music, he has a very interesting history of participating in major raves across the country. He's a huge soccer fan and a master in Age of Empires, but stays far away from videogames to avoid further complications in his life. A wise man, we would say, while insisting on not following the same path.
A Cris acha bem difícil falar sobre si m: Cris finds it very difficult to talk about herself. In a nutshell, she usually comes over as a woman in love with beaches, travel and happiness. A mother, body and soul, she's obstinate, hard-working and impatient. Here at Scup, she works in the New Business area.
O Darlan curte um bom heavy metal, mas o: Darlan enjoys good heavy metal, but will even listen to pagode to make his fiancée happy. In his free time, he likes playing videogames or reading a good book. A perfectionist and passionate about technology, Darlan came on board to strengthen Scup's front-end team. A former Flash programmer, his goal is to provide the best experience at all times, regardless of the platform used.
O Vicente vive por sua filha, esposa e f: Vicente lives for his wife, daughter and family. A supporter of São Paulo soccer club, he also likes to play basketball, make handicrafts and spend vacations in the countryside. He began his career as a publicist, became a designer and is now a programmer. The selective shy type, Vicente prefers not to talk much about himself.
Paulinho, nosso Scuper mogiano, tem duas: Paulinho, our very own Mogiano Scuper, has two missions: to take care of the APIs for social networks and prove to everyone that the city of Mogi das Cruzes is not in the countryside (and he swears he can't tell which is more difficult). Forever passionate about music, he tries to get his vinyl collection to work out, after failing with pogs, phone cards, hot wheels and beer bottles. Unlike every other member of our technology staff, he's terrible at playing videogames.
O Lucas é o personal Austin Powers da ár: Lucas is the Austin Powers of the Product team. He combines his "mojo" with naughty slang that sometimes didn’t seem to become him, you know, bro? Despite all listlessness and trickery, he is a romantic and sweet guy that takes his girlfriend to Disneyworld. He did a Backstreet Boys cover once and played for Real Madrid in PES 2010.
Ruivos dão azar? Não este! O Gabriel é r: Redheads are bad luck? Not this one! Gabriel is responsible for Technology team. He's super fast and wants everything ready quickly. Despite looking like Syndrome from the movie %sThe Incredibles%s, he has a soft heart and is always helping everyone. He also loves to play tennis and play with Cookie, his Border Collie. He is extremely organized and focused when performing any task. His motto is AUTOMATE.
